label.dataTitle: Enter title for user to see for this field
label.inlineHelp:
For example:
Were the instructions completing the procedure availible in English?
label.default: Were the instructions completing the procedure availible in English?

radioValues.inlineHelp:
For example: Radio values like
Yes, No, Partly

required.title: Require user input
required.customTitle: Add help message if field is required
required.customMessageTitle: This filed must have a value
required.customMessageHelpMsg: This is the message you will display to the user if they try to submit this field without any value

label.dataTitle: Field description showed to the user
label.inlineHelp: For example: Was it easy to fill in this form?
label.default: Was it easy to fill in this form?

amount.inlineHelp: Select amount of starts (Note only 5 is an option for this SDG form)

minValue.inlineHelp: For example: Not so good (or leave empty to follow SDG template)

maxValue.inlineHelp: For example: Very good (or leave empty to follow SDG template)
